properties.name: conductor.event-queues.azure.enabled
properties.description: Enable the use of Azure Queue Storage implementation to provide queues for consuming events.

properties.name: conductor.default-event-queue.type
properties.description: The default event queue type to listen on for the WAIT task.

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.azure.identity
properties.description: Authenticatation method with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

values.description: Use Azure Queue Storage as the event queue to listen on for the WAIT task.
